plot outline: An IT professional Aditya Pradhan is an workaholic he can provide all comfort to his family but has no time for them every day is a working Monday for him.One day Aditya wakes up and finds that its Sunday but every morning the day never changes for him as it always Sunday for which never ends while people around him also feel the same.Aditya then meets a blind men Benaam Kumar who tells him about the richness of life and what is he leaving behind.
title: Kashala Udyachi Baat
plot: An IT professional Aditya Pradhan is an workaholic he can provide all comfort to his family but has no time for them every day is a working Monday for him.One day Aditya wakes up and finds that its Sunday but every morning the day never changes for him as it always Sunday for which never ends while people around him also feel the same.Aditya then meets a blind men Benaam Kumar who tells him about the richness of life and what is he leaving behind.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
